        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
           **1.To get [ first_name ] i.e. user details        and     [   createdby    ] :**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ): 
          /userDetails/users
          (**e.g.** "id": 2047,  "first_name": "Read Write Admin")
          **2.To get [  Phone Code ]  for respective country :**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Rules and MDM ):  
          /country/phone-code
          (**e.g.** "country_name": "United Kingdom","phone_code": "44") 
          **3.To get [  role_id ] :** 
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ): 
          /roleDetails/roleList
          (**e.g.** "id": 1,                "name": "Global Admin")
          **4.To get [   program_group    ] :**
          --&gt; Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ) :                            
          /programGroups/get-list
          (**e.g.** "id": 18, "name": "All programs")
          
          **5.To get [   report_group    ] :**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ) :                                                               
          /reportGroups/get-list
          (**e.g.** "id": 4,  "name": "FraudSeer Reports")
          **6.For   email_notification,  is_active,  is_deleted, two_factor_auth_status, is_admin** 
          Description:  
          If Yes then "1" , 
          If No then "0"
          (**e.g.** "email_notification": "0")
          
          **7.To get [   cluster_id    ] :**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ):                                                                
          /clusterDetails/list
          (**e.g.** "id": 2,  "name": "Dev225")
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
